item.title: Ram Air Inlet/Exhaust Door Systems – All Cargo Configuration

remarks.para: One may be inoperative in any position provided associated pack is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Air Conditioning Packs.

numlitem.para: With one pack inoperative, limit altitude to FL350 or below.

note.para: With an air conditioning pack inoperative or OFF, isolation valve closed, and anti-ice OFF, a BLEED OFF Light may illuminate during takeoff power application. Under these conditions, the PRSOV is regulating air pressure to a point where the valve angle is small enough to activate the light switch. As engine power, and thus air pressure, is reduced the valve angle opens slightly and the BLEED OFF Light extinguishes.

numlitem.para: Limit flight altitude to FL350 or below.

placard.para: Placard affected Pack Control Selector "RAM AIR INLET/EX DOOR INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: Ram Air Inlet/Exhaust Door Systems
maintenance.para: Doors In Any Other Position (Affected Pack Deactivated):

note.para: Exit area must be greater than inlet area to prevent noise and vibration due to possible adverse pressure gradient.

numlitem.para: Rotate pack control selector to OFF. Verify that PACK OFF light comes on.

Open and collar applicable L or R PACK FLOW CONTROL circuit breaker on the P11 overhead panel. For aircraft with exhaust doors, if exit area is not clearly greater than inlet area proceed with step 3 or 4.
Verify that the Ram Air Exhaust Door is in the full open position.
Disconnect, cap and stow Electrical Connector for Exhaust Door Actuator.
If Exhaust Door is inoperative - not full open:
Fabricate Actuator Link 11.1 inch long with rod ends compatible with door actuator fittings.
Position door to full open position and install actuator link in place of Ram Air Actuator.
For Left Ram Air Inlet/Exhaust Door System inoperative, close the L PACK FLOW CONTROL circuit breaker.
Notify dispatch that (left or right) pack is inoperative and flight will be limited to FL350 or below.

sheet.title: RAM AIR EXHAUST DOOR OPEN POSITION RAM AIR INLET/EXHAUST DOOR INSTALLATION
